main.name: Mateusz Wrobel
main.description: My goal is to become a fullstack developer with skills in cloud services, serverless solutions which I think are awesome. I love to learn new skills and technologies, as a developer I constantly work on various projects, learning new solutions and developing myself in IT world. It is my great passion that I have discovered and I plan to pursue it. I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills
main.bio: I work as a freelance fullstack developer and I am looking for opportunity to start a full time job as a software developer. I feel comfortable using python, css, javascript, react. I am a big fan of cloud computing, serverless solutions. In my free time I love spending time outside - on my bike, on my kayak or on a football pitch. I like video editing and making dioramas.
main.contactmessage: Thank you for visiting my website. If you have any question please do not hesitate to contact me via a form below.

resume.skillmessage: My core skills relate to the python language and its libraries such as: django, drf, flask. Moreover I can use frontend technologies like html, css and javascript with react. I am keen learner so the sky is the limit.

education.description: The training comprised 240 workshop hours. It provided knowledge and practical skills in the field of: Python, Django, REST API, Docker, Jenkins, SQL, Scrum.
The training provided knowledge and practical skills in the field of: HTML, CSS, basic JavaScript.

education.school: AGH University of Science and Technology
education.degree: Msc Mining and Geology - Drilling and Geoengineering
education.description: The studies covered general issues in the field of engineering(fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, maths, geophysics), geology, construction, as well as the design of drilling works. Program included issues related to oil, geothermal and geoengineering drilling as well as different energy modules.
education.thesis: Diploma thesis: “Surfactants in completion and workover fluids.

work.description: Land surveys for updating maps, boundary surveys, inventory surveys, setting out and as-build surveys.
